<< corrcoef statistics mean >>

cov

Covariance

Syntax

C = cov(M)

Input argument

M

a vector or matrix

Output argument

V

Covariance of M.

Description

C = cov(M) returns the covariance.

Example

M = [4 -7 3; 1 4 -2; 10 7 9];
C = cov(M)

See also

var, mean.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< corrcoef statistics mean >>
